rooms.description: Two-car garage with eco-friendly features such as solar panels and natural lighting.
Open-plan living area with natural ventilation and Vastu-aligned entrance, perfect for social gatherings. Uses sustainable materials and eco-friendly fixtures.
Compact dining space integrated into the living area with a view to the garden.
Energy-efficient kitchen designed for minimal water and energy consumption. Incorporates eco-friendly appliances and natural lighting.
Cozy library space with built-in shelves, ample natural light, and a quiet nook for reading.
Compact private gym area featuring multi-purpose eco-friendly equipment and good ventilation. Designed to blend with the overall aesthetics of the bungalow.
Functional space for work or study, optimized for natural light and minimal energy use.

openings.details: Large entry door with eco-friendly materials and designed in accordance with Vastu principles to invite positive energy.
Double-glazed windows ensuring insulation and natural light.
Secure exit with eco-friendly construction materials.

additional_info.budget_considerations: Cost-effective solutions implemented throughout to adhere to a tight budget, including use of locally sourced materials.
